attributes.action: require Hastings council to abolish its constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the constitution is constructed in such a way as to prevent elected representatives
from having an efective vote.
Desision are taken by commitee,an elected member cannot be party to a commitee unless the member is a member of a party of 2+ members.If all wards were to return independents Council would not be able to function.This is a basic afront to Democracy.
